title: 美国证明自己找个傻子做总统也可以，川普还要和多少人吵架？ CNN 视频Fauci 医生很难为川普工作
contents:
我一直希望 川普连任， 但是最近发现他真得很难连任。

背景资料， Fauci 是美国防疫指挥的医生， 川普好像认为自己比 Fauci 更懂防疫， 川普太爱吵架。 真让人无语了。

Wikipedia :
Anthony Stephen Fauci ( /ˈfaʊtʃi/; born December 24, 1940) is an American physician and immunologist who has served as the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) since 1984. Since January 2020, he has been one of the lead members of the Trump Administration's White House Coronavirus Task Force addressing the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States.
